design_philosophy.core_concept: The user is accessing a forbidden archive. The interface is a tool of the stateâ€”heavy, industrial, and oppressive, but the content reveals the cracks in the facade.

rules: HEADINGS: Uppercase, tight tracking (-0.02em), massive sizes for impact.
BODY: Monospace, comfortable reading size (16px+), high contrast.
ACCENTS: Use 'stamped' rotation (-2deg or 2deg) for emphasis.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for sections. Create 'breathing room' around heavy content.
layout.z_index_strategy: Layered depth. Background textures < Content < Redaction Bars < Modals/Overlays

variants.primary: bg-accent_red text-white border-accent_red hover:bg-transparent hover:text-accent_red transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Flat, dark surface, 1px border. No shadow. 'Dossier' feel.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-white/20 focus:border-accent_red outline-none rounded-none px-0 py-2 font-mono

redaction.description: Black bars over text that reveal content on hover.
redaction.css_class: bg-black text-black hover:bg-transparent hover:text-white transition-all duration-500 cursor-help select-none

textures.grain: Overlay a fixed noise texture with opacity-5 pointer-events-none mix-blend-overlay
textures.paper: Use the 'Dark Crumpled Paper' image as a subtle background blend for the 'Classified' sections.

effects.crt_flicker: Optional subtle animation for the 'Cine-Analisi' section.
effects.stamp: Border-4 border-accent_red text-accent_red font-bold uppercase p-2 rotate-[-12deg] inline-block opacity-80 mix-blend-screen

homepage.layout: Hero Section with 'Warning' Modal overlay. Background is the dark crumpled paper. Large 'TOP SECRET' stamp animation.

pravda_vs_realta.layout: Split screen or Slider. Left: Propaganda (Colorful, Heroic). Right: Reality (B&W, Gritty).
pravda_vs_realta.interaction: Draggable slider to reveal the truth behind the poster.

cine_analisi.layout: Grid of video cards. Each card looks like a film reel canister or a classified tape.

quiz.layout: Single column, focused. Looks like an interrogation room form.

accessibility.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Disable flicker effects if set.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Extend the theme with the colors provided in 'colors.palette'.
3. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build the 'RedactedText' and 'Stamp' components first as they are key to the identity.
4. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn for complex interactions (Slider, Dialog, Accordion) but STRIP their default styling to match the 'Bureaucratic Noir' theme.
5. NO ROUNDED CORNERS: Force 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' (2px) on everything. No soft UI.
6. LANGUAGE: Ensure all static text is in Italian as requested.
